trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Santa Maria
There were no other sightings in Santa Maria on or around April 14th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsApril 14th,I went outside my residence that evening to see if I would be able tosee the planetary allignment that night, i happened to look west about 40degrees above the horizon and noticed a very bright and large orange light inthe western sky. i was not sure if it was moving towards me or was a stationaryobject atb first , then i realized that it was coming rather straight on. slowlyand steady it came until it flew direcly overhead ,it had come out of the west,and as it passed it arched to a southerly direction towards Los Angeles,I wouldquestimate. additionally and actually there were two objects, both were thesame, they were both the same color as an orange marker light that you would seeon a semi tractor trailor truck... it was as if the were in tandem , very highup in space traveling probally 25 thousand miles per hour ,,,no sound ,no changein color, I feel we are not alone in this universe. thats what I had seen,,,, Psthat night itb was reported that ther had been an earthquake in Mexico... thatsit
